description.value:
At 3rd level, you gain proficiency in the Wisdom (Insight) and Wisdom (Medicine) skills, and you gain proficiency with the herbalism kit. If you already have proficiency with either of these skills, you gain proficiency in another monk skill at first level. If you already have proficiency with a herbalism kit, you gain proficiency in another artisan's tool of your choice. You also gain a special mask, which you often wear when using the features of this subclass. You determine its appearance, or can generate it randomly by rolling on the Merciful Mask table.

Merciful Mask
[[/r d6]]Mask Appearance
1Raven
2Blank and white
3Crying visage
4Laughing visage
5Skull
6Butterfly
7Spiral pattern
8Jackal


At 11th level, while you are wearing your Merciful Mask and you hit a creature with a monk weapon or unarmed strike you can make a Wisdom (Medicine) check to gain an understanding of its vitals. The DC of the check is equal to the Constitution score of the creature. On a success your monk weapon attacks and unarmed strikes score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 against the creature or similar creatures (at the DMs discretion). This benefit lasts until you finish a short or long rest.
